title: Formative Assessment Design and Feedback Strategies in Technology-Enhanced Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in utilizing mobile devices
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course for in-service professionals, emphasizing feedback based on formative assessment data in a mobile-based microlearning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify formative assessment participation patterns with over 80% accuracy by analyzing learning platform log data.
Learners can design personalized feedback using five core variables (response time, frequency of error correction, login frequency, etc.) extracted from learning analytics (LA) tools.
Learners can diagnose individualized learning strategies (e.g., active recall, spaced learning) based on formative assessment results and incorporate them into instructional design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
